contest-event.event-date: Sept. 1, 1956 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Sherburn in Elmet, North Yorkshire March contest - 1st Brancepeth, 2nd Thornley, 3rd Brandon. Held in conjunction with Sherburn Flower Show. 5 bands competed.
